issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Hive shims report Unrecognized Hadoop major version number: 3.0.0-alpha2-SNAPSHOT

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Dataframes doesn't work on Hadoop 3.x; Hive rejects Hadoop version

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: We only have one shim, so for now, we are going to use that. Hopefully we won't need shims and build profiles for Hadoop 3

comments.body: [~ashutoshc] can you take a look? This will allow to run on Hadoop 3 to see what breaks.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12855470/HIVE-16081.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 324 failed/errored test(s), 6926 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
